message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I believe this split reflects our positions in this game.
Considering the impact of inflation, I believe a 55-45 split is fair for both of us. Let's settle this round.
Bob, I understand the inflation affects things, but my position in the game is still stronger. I'll agree to an even 55-45 split to end this quickly.
Alice, given the ongoing inflation and to end this quickly, I propose a 50-50 split. It's fair and considers the diminishing value of money for me.
